item.title: Why we really need CALDO
item.description: Enterprise Digital Transformations are complex business. Today’s Enterprise eCommerce Sites are complex mission-critical systems. To understand where complexity comes from, here are some of the questions that need to be answered continuously for the code written and shipped incrementally by a modern software development team. Does it work? Is it performant? Is it secure? Is it available? Is it reliable? Is it scalable? Is it resilient? Is it responsive design?
